page.title: 08ORGANISATIONS
page.content: BADMINTON CLUB. Meets in the Market Hall from September to April.There are two teams playing in the Westmorland Badminton League Division 3 and division 5. The officals of the club are chairman Mr L. Wharton, Secetary Mrs B. Mawson and treasurer Mrs M. Hornsby. WOMENS INSTITUTE. Meets every second Thursday of the month in the chapel tea room. The President is Mrs M. Beck, the Secretary, Mrs M.Unwin and Treasurer, Mrs A.Mason. There are 22 members. The Institute was orignally formed in 1930. Activities include meetings with guest speakers,fund raising and an annual walk. YOUTH CLUB. Youngsters aged between 10 and 16 go to the Club, which is normally held in the Market Hall. Mr Lanty Wharton is the youth leader, helped by Mr Tom Minton.
